  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 (2001) and above or AMD Processors after 2003
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics card that supports Direct X 9 or above.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X 9 sound device

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 (2001) and above or AMD Processors after 2003
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics card that supports Unity games
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any graphics card that supports Unity games

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 (2001) and above or AMD Processors after 2003
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics card that supports Unity games
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any graphics card that supports Unity games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 | AMD FX-8350 | or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 | AMD Radeon R9 290 | or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows Vista
  • Processor: Core i3 / AMD A6 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 / AMD Radeon HD 5750. OpenGL 3.3
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1300 MB available space

  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1300 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 2.9 Ghz или аналогичный

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
